001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeProvider;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * Provides runtime discovery of built-in implementations of the core Metaschema
014 * data types.
015 */
016@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
017public final class MetaschemaDataTypeProvider // NOPMD - Used for service initialization
018    extends AbstractDataTypeProvider {
019  @NonNull
020  public static final Base64Adapter BASE64 = new Base64Adapter();
021  @NonNull
022  public static final BooleanAdapter BOOLEAN = new BooleanAdapter();
023  @NonNull
024  public static final DateAdapter DATE = new DateAdapter();
025  @NonNull
026  public static final DateWithTZAdapter DATE_WITH_TZ = new DateWithTZAdapter();
027  @NonNull
028  public static final DateTimeAdapter DATE_TIME = new DateTimeAdapter();
029  @NonNull
030  public static final DateTimeWithTZAdapter DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ = new DateTimeWithTZAdapter();
031  @NonNull
032  public static final IPv4AddressAdapter IP_V4_ADDRESS = new IPv4AddressAdapter();
033  @NonNull
034  public static final IPv6AddressAdapter IP_V6_ADDRESS = new IPv6AddressAdapter();
035  @NonNull
036  public static final UriAdapter URI = new UriAdapter();
037  @NonNull
038  public static final UriReferenceAdapter URI_REFERENCE = new UriReferenceAdapter();
039  @NonNull
040  public static final UuidAdapter UUID = new UuidAdapter();
041
042  @NonNull
043  public static final DayTimeAdapter DAY_TIME_DURATION = new DayTimeAdapter();
044  @NonNull
045  public static final YearMonthAdapter YEAR_MONTH_DURATION = new YearMonthAdapter();
046
047  @NonNull
048  public static final DecimalAdapter DECIMAL = new DecimalAdapter();
049  @NonNull
050  public static final IntegerAdapter INTEGER = new IntegerAdapter();
051  @NonNull
052  public static final NonNegativeIntegerAdapter NON_NEGATIVE_INTEGER = new NonNegativeIntegerAdapter();
053  @NonNull
054  public static final PositiveIntegerAdapter POSITIVE_INTEGER = new PositiveIntegerAdapter();
055
056  @NonNull
057  public static final EmailAddressAdapter EMAIL_ADDRESS = new EmailAddressAdapter();
058  @NonNull
059  public static final HostnameAdapter HOSTNAME = new HostnameAdapter();
060  @Deprecated(since = "0.7.0")
061  @NonNull
062  public static final NcNameAdapter NCNAME = new NcNameAdapter();
063  @NonNull
064  public static final StringAdapter STRING = new StringAdapter();
065  @NonNull
066  public static final TokenAdapter TOKEN = new TokenAdapter();
067
068  @NonNull
069  public static final StringAdapter DEFAULT_DATA_TYPE = STRING;
070
071  /**
072   * Initialize the built-in data types.
073   */
074  public MetaschemaDataTypeProvider() {
075    // The data type "string" must be first since this is the default data type for
076    // the {@link String}
077    // Java type. This ensures that when a data type is resolved that this data type
078    // is matched first
079    // before other String-based data types.
080    registerDatatype(STRING);
081
082    registerDatatype(BASE64);
083    registerDatatype(BOOLEAN);
084    registerDatatype(DATE);
085    registerDatatype(DATE_WITH_TZ);
086    registerDatatype(DATE_TIME);
087    registerDatatype(DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ);
088    registerDatatype(DAY_TIME_DURATION);
089    registerDatatype(DECIMAL);
090    registerDatatype(EMAIL_ADDRESS);
091    registerDatatype(HOSTNAME);
092    registerDatatype(INTEGER);
093    registerDatatype(IP_V4_ADDRESS);
094    registerDatatype(IP_V6_ADDRESS);
095
096    registerDatatype(NON_NEGATIVE_INTEGER);
097    registerDatatype(POSITIVE_INTEGER);
098    registerDatatype(TOKEN);
099    registerDatatype(URI);
100    registerDatatype(URI_REFERENCE);
101    registerDatatype(UUID);
102    registerDatatype(YEAR_MONTH_DURATION);
103  }
104}
